name: INDICAM
goal: Indicam is the biggest italian association for the defense of IPRs and to help companies fight against counterfeiting. Main goals of the organization are representing them in advocacy activitities, managing their relations with public and enforcement authorities, cooperating with public institutions for the spreding of the culture of IPRs
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: INDICAM is monitoring activities running in the EU. The association is managing relations with MEPs, as well as currently following dossier on TM package, plain package tobacco, DSM, IPRs enforcement
